_header: A pack a pack madame my load alight
Subjects: love lyrics; roundels; lovers, addresses to beloved

BLHar682.First Lines:
A Pak a pak madame my lode alightForwhi allas y bere to hevy
                    lo…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…And without yow y may no ferthir goSo helpe me sett my crokid
                    burthen right
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
